argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | opncldf.1 | |- X = U. J |
| 2 |  | opncldf.2 | |- F = ( u e. J |-> ( X \ u ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ A e. J ) -> A e. J ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_opncld | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ A e. J ) -> ( X \ A ) e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_difeq2 | |- ( u = A -> ( X \ u ) = ( X \ A ) ) |
| 6 | 5, 2 | #P_fvmptg | |- ( ( A e. J /\ ( X \ A ) e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) -> ( F ` A ) = ( X \ A ) ) |
| 7 | 3, 4, 6 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ A e. J ) -> ( F ` A ) = ( X \ A ) ) |
